comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Telegram groups, channels and even other social platforms like YouTube, twitter can be helpful, but they are risk, too many scammers on the internet and many of them are in those groups. Privately chatting prospective victims, mimicking the names of real influencers, and so many other processes. Well using myself as an example, I didn't learn Bitcoin or won’t learn Bitcoin from any telegram group, why not right out learn through reading! Read books, articles, News, go for Bitcoin functions. Create a rapport with those that know bitcoin I suggest a physical rapport. And you are here on the forum (free to ask questions and get answers) I wonder why you would risk it all just to be on a telegram group. Is it worth it?
